website_summaries.verdict: A must for Presta valve users, the BV Ergonomic has no problem reaching the 120 psi required by many road bike tires – and it's very versatile.
pros: Rated to 160 psi, 120 psi is easy to reach with the BV and gauge is accurate
Plastic base and large plastic handle provide good stability
Built-in Schrader and Presta valves can be quickly switched using a turn-and-lock mechanism at end of nozzle
Sport ball and bladder adapters included
cons: It is smaller than other floor pumps and feels a bit flimsy despite its metal barrel
Overly snug valve fit requires users to be careful when removing the nozzle from Schrader valves to avoid damaging the stem

customer_reviews.title: The pump is pretty good but the gauge is garbage

customer_reviews.title: Really Blows!
customer_reviews.text: Pump does pump air, that is a success. There are three main points of issue with the pump. 1. The Schrader/Presta nozzle allows for a serious amount of loss when decoupling from the valve stem. 2. There is entirely too much plastic. 3. The pressure gauge is off by about 30%. I would not buy this again, the Bell bike pump at Wal-mart actuall is a better performing unit at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IMPORTANT READ THIS!  Excellent Pump!
customer_reviews.text: The best hand air pump that I have ever owned. Good quality & excellent pressure gauge. From other's comments they have become frustrated attempting to operate the pump properly. This is the procedure that works for me: Gently push the pump's nozzle onto the valve stem with the nozzle's lever DOWN. After placing the pump's nozzle all the way on the valve stem, so that the valve stem's thread is covered by the nozzle, flip the lever UP to push the Schrader valve in. Mine locks on the valve stem using this procedure. The pump works perfectly when I do this.
customer_reviews.author: W. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: I really like the fact that you can use it on different ...

product_meta.title: BV Bicycle Ergonomic Floor Pump with Gauge & Clever Air Valve, 160 psi, Reversible Presta and Schrader
product_meta.description:
BV Bike Pump is a high quality bicycle floor pump with easy-to read large gauge and smart valve head that can fit both Presta and Schrader. This pump is available in 2 colors - yellow and silver. The solid and sturdy bike pump is the perfect bicycle pump for competitive and social riders.

Twin Valve Design

Newly designed valve head can switch between Presta and Schrader valves easily and without any air leaks. No more reverse!

Stability

Stable, durable base and oversized handle make this floor pump easy to inflate tire to high pressure of 160 PSI.

Inflation Speed

The long steel/Aluminum barrel allows more air to be pushed through with each pump making it easier and faster to pump. Our extra long hose with 360 degree pivot will make your pumping easier.

Accurate and Easy-to-read Large Gauge

The large gauge is easy to read and will help you to set your desired pressure.

1 Year Warranty

BV warrants this product against defects in materials and workmanship for a period of One Year.



Specifications:

Max Pressure: 160 psi
Valve Type: Twin valve head design can fit both Presta and Schrader
Weight: 2 lbs
Dimensions: 24 in x 9.5 in x 5 in

Content:

- 1 x BV Bike Pump
